metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5313 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
libImaging/FliDecode.c in Pillow before 6.2.2 has an FLI buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-5313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pillow package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2').
